name: Trashman - Remake
description:
A remake of the classic Spectrum game, Trashman, circa  1984 by New Generation Software. 

Not all features of the original game are implemented, enough to play and have fun.

Collect the bins, empty the contents in the garbage truck and return the bin to the original place. You're being tested by the company, don't take too long. Help out the customers for some extra bonus time, and avoid the grass and the cars!
